plus.blocks.geode.tooltip: Hmm... Something heavy should crack it...
plus.blocks.cracked_geode.tooltip: Almost there... Maybe one more time...
plus.advancements.story.root.title: Welcome to Plus-!
plus.advancements.story.campfire.title: It's the Power of Love
plus.advancements.story.campfire.desc: Craft a campfire and feel it's healing warmth
plus.advancements.story.seeds.title: Future Plant
plus.advancements.story.seeds.desc: Get a seed and set off your farming adventures
plus.advancements.story.sleep.title: Sweet Dreams
plus.advancements.story.dream.title: Even Sweeter Dreams
plus.advancements.story.dream.desc: Get a 1 in 7.5 trillion chance to have a "dream"
plus.advancements.story.break_stone.desc: Break some stone with your newly acquired wooden pickaxe
plus.advancements.story.craft_stone_pick: Upgrade to a not-so-shiny stone pickaxe
plus.advancements.story.iron_ingot.title: Now With More Fe
plus.advancements.story.diamonds.title: A Diamond a Day...
plus.advancements.story.lava.title: Hot Stuff
plus.advancements.story.enter_nether.des: Build, light and enter a nether portal
plus.advancements.story.gear_up.title: Geared Up!
plus.advancements.story.gear_up.desc: Get some protection to get yourself through the night
plus.advancements.story.the_end.title: The End
plus.advancements.story.the_end.desc: Jump into the portal at the end of the game
plus.advancements.armory.root.title: Armory
plus.advancements.armory.root.desc: The outside world is dangerous, better get yourself prepared
plus.advancements.armory.get_iron_gear.d: Get a full kit of iron equipment
plus.advancements.armory.get_diamond_gea: Get a full kit of diamond equipment
plus.advancements.armory.get_netherite_g: Get a full kit of netherite equipment
plus.advancements.armory.get_leather_gea: Get a full set of leather armor, for some reason...
plus.advancements.armory.get_cladded_gea: Get a set of cladded armor
plus.advancements.armory.artifacts.title: Next Thursday
plus.advancements.armory.artifacts_all.d: Find every artifact in the game
plus.advancements.armory.anvil.title: My Crush
plus.advancements.armory.anvil.desc: Get an anvil for your anviling needs
plus.advancements.armory.enchanting_tabl: Find or make an enchanting table
plus.advancements.armory.altar.title: Cursery!
plus.advancements.armory.altar.desc: Get an altar to further power-up your items... at a cost
plus.advancements.armory.boss_hunter.des: Find and slain every boss in the game
plus.advancements.armory.cleansing.title: The Cleansing
plus.advancements.armory.cleansing.desc: Kill every hostile monster in the game, not including bosses
plus.advancements.armory.used_totem.desc: Use a totem of undying to cheat death
plus.advancements.armory.used_totem_ench: Use an enchanted totem of undying to fully cheat death
plus.advancements.master_chef.root.title: Cooking
plus.advancements.master_chef.root.desc: An entire chapter dedicated to food!
plus.advancements.master_chef.novice.des: Cook anything edible in the oven
plus.advancements.master_chef.extremly_n: Cook every simple meal there is
plus.advancements.husbandry.root.title: Husbandry
plus.advancements.husbandry.root.desc: The world is full of Friends and Flavors
Plant a Seed and watch it grow
plus.advancements.husbandry.plant_seeds_: Plant every crop there is to plant
Get a knife to harvest more goods from plants and animals
plus.advancements.husbandry.get_ham.desc: Harvest some ham from pigs using a knife
plus.advancements.husbandry.netherite_kn: If You Can't Take the Heat
Spend a whole netherite ingot on upgrading your knife! Or get out of the kitchen!
plus.advancements.husbandry.get_knifes.t: Know How I Got These Knifes?
plus.advancements.husbandry.get_knifes.d: Obtain every knife in the game and get checked
plus.advancements.husbandry.straw.title: Eco-Friendly
plus.advancements.husbandry.straw.desc: Use a knife to get straws from grass and crops
plus.advancements.husbandry.rich_soil.de: Leave organic compost to decompose until it becomes Rich Soil. Mushrooms might help
plus.advancements.husbandry.netherite_ho: Break an entire Netherite Hoe and then reevaluate your life choices
plus.advancements.husbandry.safe_honey.d: Use a Campfire to safely collect Honey from bees
plus.advancements.husbandry.candle.title: the Candle Maker
plus.advancements.husbandry.goodbeeye.de: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using silk touch
plus.advancements.adventure.root.title: Adventure
plus.advancements.adventure.root.desc: The world is an exciting place and you're the one to discover it
plus.advancements.adventure.all_discs.de: Collect every music disc in the game
plus.advancements.adventure.mimic.title: Made Ya Jump!
Trade with a villager for the first time
plus.advancements.adventure.badlands.dis: Collect the Music Disc from the Badlands biome
plus.advancements.adventure.badlands.hat: I Wanna be a Cowboy Baby
Find and wear a cowboy hat
Find a tapestry inside the Woodland Mansion
Collect the Music Disc from the Dark Forest biome
plus.advancements.adventure.mushroom_fie: Collect the Music Disc from the Mushroom Fields biome
Find every Glowshroom on the Island
plus.advancements.adventure.swamp.title: Dirty Waters
plus.advancements.adventure.swamp.disc.d: Collect the Music Disc from the Swamp
Turn Obsidian into Crying Obsidian by using Onions
plus.advancements.adventure.on_top_of_th: Toss a Dragon Egg from really high up
plus.book.cook_book.name: Cook Book
plus.book.cook_book.landind_text: Your №1 Guide to the land of flavors
